DataElement.preferredName: Dual X-ray Absorptiometry Assessment Performed Anatomic Site Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the anatomic site that is being evaluated using dual x-ray absorptiometry.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to dual X-ray absorptiometry (DEXA) assessment performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A technique for scanning bone and measuring bone mineral density (BMD). A DXA scanner produces 2 X-ray beams, each with different energy levels. One beam is high energy while the other is low energy. The amount of x-rays that pass through the bone is measured for each beam. This will vary depending on the thickness of the bone. Based on the difference between the 2 beams, the bone density can be measured. (MedicineNet.com):Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A technique for scanning bone and measuring bone mineral density (BMD). A DXA scanner produces 2 X-ray beams, each with different energy levels. One beam is high energy while the other is low energy. The amount of x-rays that pass through the bone is measured for each beam. This will vary depending on the thickness of the bone. Based on the difference between the 2 beams, the bone density can be measured.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

Based on the difference between the 2 beams, the bone density can be measured._Named locations of or within the body._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The total of part of a series of numbers.

Concepts.definition: The total of part of a series of numbers.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The anterior or superior part of an animal, containing the brain, or chief ganglia of the nervous system, the mouth, and in the higher animals, the chief sensory organs. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The anterior and superior part of a human bearing the mouth, the brain and sensory organs.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The body excluding the head and neck and limbs.

Concepts.definition: The body excluding the head and neck and limbs.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: One of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The portion of the lower extremity between the knee and the ankle. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole inferior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: One of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The portion of the lower extremity between the knee and the ankle. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole inferior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The portion of the upper extremity between the shoulder and the elbow. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole superior limb.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.
